p: Data on food consumption in Peruvian households were obtained from a national survey performed by the Peruvian Statistics Unit (i.e., INEI), ENAPREF [ 36], which aggregates the most recent purchase of food patterns in households between May 2008 and April 2009 for a total of 36,234 dwellings. Of these, 34,698 were sampled in urban environments, which led to the decision to focus mainly on cities [ 37].
